level.text: Each applicant determined to be eligible pursuant to the criteria set forth in Section 6401 shall be entitled to full Medicaid benefits, including but not limited to the following services:
Mental health and substance abuse services;
Each participant shall receive HIV prescription medications through the DOH’s pharmacy network.
Medical treatment for waiver recipients shall not include investigational or experimental therapy, drugs, or surgery.
